sentences.sContent: A high level of anxiety was created by the introduction of cameras into the factory.
sentences.sCn: 工厂安装了摄像头，这引起了工人的高度不安。

sentences.sContent: It can help if you discuss your anxieties with someone.
sentences.sCn: 与别人谈谈自己的忧虑会有帮助的。

sentences.sContent: ...who spend a lot of time reading to children and worrying about their anxiety levels and hectic schedules...
...the true source of the anxiety and panic remains what it has always been...
...For all the anxiety the essay causes...
...This should have primed the subjects with "stereotype threat" – an anxiety that their results will confirm negative stereotypes...
...Being able to check in with a child anytime goes a long way toward relieving parental anxiety and may help parents loosen their control a little sooner...
...every missing child case gets so much airtime that it’s not surprising even normal parental anxiety can be amplified...
...Being able to find out where a child is anytime helps lessen parents’ Their anxiety and control...

synos.tran: [心理]焦虑；渴望；挂念；令人焦虑的事

phrases.pCn: 焦虑症；焦虑性障碍；焦虑症候群
广泛性焦虑，广泛性焦虑障碍

remMethod.val: 来自anxious(adj. 担忧的； 渴望的)

trans.tranOther: the feeling of being very worried about something
